Title: MVVM Stack for WinJS
Description:
A set of reusable WinJS classes that helps you creating Windows Store Applications using MVVM Pattern.
-Supports suspend/resume
-Messaging
-Blendability

Project Description
A set of reusable WinJS classes that helps you creating Windows Store Applications using MVVM Pattern.
-Supports suspend/resume
-Messaging
-Blendability


A reusable set of javascript classes for creating Windows Store apps using MVVM Pattern.

Documentation

Inside Documentation area you'll find a series of blog posts describin how the stack works and how to use it in your WinJS applications
